import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useCart } from '../context/CartContext'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import './Payment.css'; const Payment = () => { const { cartItems, cartTotals } = useCart(); const { user } = useAuth(); const [paymentMethod, setPaymentMethod] = useState('card'); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ // Billing Info (pre-filled from user if available) fullName: user?.name || '', email: user?.email || '', phone: user?.phone || '', address: '', city: '', state: '', pincode: '', // Card Info cardNumber: '', expiryDate: '', cvv: '', cardName: '', // UPI Info upiId: '' }); const navigate = useNavigate(); // Use cartTotals from CartContext instead of calculating here const total = cartTotals.total || 0; const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Simulate payment processing alert('Payment successful! Your order has been placed.'); navigate('/'); }; if (cartItems.length === 0) { return (

Your cart is empty. Please add items before proceeding to payment.

); } return (

Tax (GST 18%) â‚¹{cartTotals.gst}
Total â‚¹{total}
); }; export default Payment;
